1.0.0.name: wordpress/search-engines
1.0.0.description:
Search Engines is a smart plugin that helps you to optimize the blog for SEO purposes by eliminating issues with duplicate content and specifying meta tags and page titles for different posts types and taxonomies.

If you operate your website for hobby or profit, SEO can be an important tool in making your website popular. SEO is not rocket science (or anywhere close to it). But it certainly can get as technical and detailed as you want to make it.

This plugin is here to help you get your job done!

Features

  • Title control
  • Meta descriptions
  • Meta keywords
  • Avoid duplicate content
  • Canonical URLs
  • Protect RSS Feeds
  • Custom Post Types
  • Taxonomies
  • And more...

Localization

  • English
  • Español
